judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of the able President Judge of the court below.
See Stone’s Estate, 35 D. & C. 615.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: E. Russell Shockley, Deputy Attorney General, with him F. Gilman Spencer, Special Deputy Attorney General, and Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kelly’s Estate.
Argued November 27, 1939.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
George F. Douglas, for appellant.
E. Russell Shockley, Deputy Attorney General, with him F. Gilman Spencer, Special Deputy Attorney General, and Claude T. Reno, Attorney General, for appellee.
December 8, 1939:
